title: Patti LuPone stuns Broadway as The Apologizer
description: On Instagram, Patti LuPone apologized after 500 Broadway artists asked her to stop bullying her fellow artists. The post Patti LuPone stuns Broadway as The Apologizer appeared first on AV Club.
author: Matt Schimkowitz

title: Court is now in session for Saul Goodman V. Jimmy McGill in exclusive book excerpt
description: Author Alan Sepinwall talks to series co-creator Peter Gould in this excerpt from The Complete Critical Companion To Better Call Saul. The post Court is now in session for Saul Goodman V. Jimmy McGill in exclusive book excerpt appeared first on AV Club.
author: Jen Lennon

title: Crunchyroll Winter 2023 Simulcast Slate Offers Largest Line-Up Yet

title: Superman & Lois, James Gunn/DCU, Sandman & More: BCTV Daily Dispatch

title: Happy Face Cancelled at Paramount+
description: Gray skies will not be clearing up on Paramount+ anytime soon: Happy Face has been canceled after one season, TVLine has confirmed. The series was based on the real-life story of Melissa G. Moore, who found out at 15 years old that her father was actually an infamous serial killer who went by the name […]
author: Andy Swift

title: Joey + Pacey 4eva! Dawson’s Creek Stars Katie Holmes and Joshua Jackson to Reunite in Happy Hours Film Trilogy
description: Guess they didn’t want to wait for their lives to be over. Dawson’s Creek alums Katie Holmes and Joshua Jackson are reuniting to star in Happy Hours, an upcoming film trilogy, it was announced on Monday. Holmes will also write and direct the trilogy, with her and Jackson playing “two people navigating their relationship within […]
author: Dave Nemetz
